reuo.resources

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.Palette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loadable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hue.HuePalette

    public class Palette
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loadable
    A color index for Bitmaps with 8-bit image data. Palettes are Loadable and will reflect 16-bit color entries. The underlying Buffer the pixels are stored in may be direct or non-direct and is not garuanteed to be a specific type of Buffer.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives, Lucas Green

      • load

        public void load(java.nio.ByteBuffer in)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Loadable
        Loads this from the provided data source. The position and limit of the buffer will be respected, however the position is not guaranteed to be the limit after invocation.
        Specified by:
        load in interface Loadable
        Parameters:
        in - the provided data source
        Throws:
